critiques.subject: Seattle skyline at night illuminated across the water
improvements: [MODERATE] Apply luminance noise reduction masked to the sky and dark water
[SUBTLE] Increase Clarity and local structure on the skyline
[MODERATE] Reduce Highlights globally or on city lights
preserve: The teal and orange complementary color grading
critiques.notes: The image has a strong stylistic direction mimicking vintage film stock with faded shadows and distinct color grading. Editing should focus on technical clean-up (noise and sharpness) without neutralizing the intentional mood.

improvements_detailed.action: Apply luminance noise reduction masked to the sky and dark water
improvements_detailed.reason: Reduces distracting digital grain in large negative spaces to create a cleaner image

improvements_detailed.action: Increase Clarity and local structure on the skyline
improvements_detailed.reason: Compensates for the soft focus to make the architecture pop against the background
Corrects the greenish murky cast in the deep sky while retaining the cool cinematic tones

improvements_detailed.action: Reduce Highlights globally or on city lights
improvements_detailed.reason: Recovers color information in blown-out light sources and windows

context.subject: Seattle skyline at night illuminated across the water
preserve: The teal and orange complementary color grading

critiques.subject: Nighttime city skyline with illuminated buildings reflected across dark water
improvements: [MODERATE] Apply luminance noise reduction (approx. 25–40) and a touch of color noise reduction (approx. 20–30), then mask sharpening heavily so it targets building edges/lights rather than the sky/water
[MODERATE] Recover highlight detail in the brightest street/building lights (Highlights -20 to -40; Whites -5 to -15) and add a gentle midtone contrast curve to keep the city punchy
[SUBTLE] Refine white balance and split-toning: slightly warm overall WB (Temp +200 to +600K) or selectively cool the shadows while keeping highlights warm (subtle teal/orange separation)

[SUBTLE] Use local adjustments to guide attention: a soft radial mask over the skyline to add Texture/Clarity (+10 to +20) and Dehaze (+5 to +10), and a subtle top gradient to darken the sky (-0.2 to -0.4 EV)
[SUBTLE] Crop slightly from the bottom (and optionally a touch from the top) to reduce empty dark water/sky and place the skyline closer to the lower third
preserve: The moody night atmosphere and deep blacks in the water
The vibrant warm city-light color contrast against the cool sky
critiques.notes: Strong night skyline with pleasing color contrast and a cinematic feel. The main limitations are visible noise in the large dark areas and slightly harsh highlight points; modest noise control, highlight recovery, and selective local contrast would noticeably polish the image while keeping the intended mood.

improvements_detailed.action: Apply luminance noise reduction (approx. 25–40) and a touch of color noise reduction (approx. 20–30), then mask sharpening heavily so it targets building edges/lights rather than the sky/water
improvements_detailed.reason: The sky and water show visible grain that reduces the clean night-sky feel; controlling noise while protecting edges improves clarity without making the skyline mushy.

improvements_detailed.action: Recover highlight detail in the brightest street/building lights (Highlights -20 to -40; Whites -5 to -15) and add a gentle midtone contrast curve to keep the city punchy
improvements_detailed.reason: Some light sources are close to clipping and feel harsh; pulling highlights back while re-adding midtone contrast retains sparkle without losing structure.

improvements_detailed.action: Refine white balance and split-toning: slightly warm overall WB (Temp +200 to +600K) or selectively cool the shadows while keeping highlights warm (subtle teal/orange separation)
improvements_detailed.reason: The current cast leans cool/teal; a controlled warm highlight/cool shadow balance keeps the night mood while making city lights look more natural and inviting.

improvements_detailed.action: Use local adjustments to guide attention: a soft radial mask over the skyline to add Texture/Clarity (+10 to +20) and Dehaze (+5 to +10), and a subtle top gradient to darken the sky (-0.2 to -0.4 EV)
improvements_detailed.reason: The skyline can separate more from the sky; targeted micro-contrast and a slight sky darken increase depth without flattening the scene.

improvements_detailed.action: Crop slightly from the bottom (and optionally a touch from the top) to reduce empty dark water/sky and place the skyline closer to the lower third
improvements_detailed.reason: There is a lot of low-detail negative space; a tighter crop strengthens composition and emphasizes the city lights.

context.subject: Nighttime city skyline with illuminated buildings reflected across dark water
preserve: The moody night atmosphere and deep blacks in the water
The vibrant warm city-light color contrast against the cool sky
